CommonIntake.prompt: Can you describe your symptoms in your own words?
Please type patient’s name (as in IC)
Is the patient pregnant or breastfeeding?
What are your symptoms? (Select one or more)
How long do the symptoms persist?
What is your body temperature? (degrees Celsius)
Do you have allergies to any medication?
Did you take any medication recently?

Diarrhoe.prompt: Normally , how is your stool frequency?
Do you start any new medication?
Did you go travel or try any new food
ANS for Less than 1 days, 2 days / less than 3 stools per day, no blood in stool
details: Activated Charcoal ( Norit): 2 tablets every 4 hours per day , you should not take activated charcoal with other drug, I will suggest you to take it at least 2 hours befor or after taking other medicine because it will remove your medicine together with the diarrhea-causing toxin
Oral rehydration salt ( B plus) : dissolve 1 sachet in 200ml of cold boiled water , 1-2 sachet for loose motion .
If your conditin become serious or do not get well ,pls refer to doctor for deeper check up
S/E : constipation and gastrointestinal disorder ( Norit)
Avoid spicy,greasy and fast food because it might worsen the diarrhoe
Maintain or increase fluid intake to prevent dehydration
Please have a good rest .Thank you for your time .
